jobs.description:
Building a Know Your Customer platform, with 7 frontend developers.
I was part of the leading team, with other frontend co-worker.
Web application built with a Micro-frontends architecture, with one BFF (Backend For Frontend) for each Micro-frontend.

jobs.description:
Help and simplify tax reporting obligations.
Migrate the old webapp from AngularJS to Angular 12
Lead frontend team of 4 developers.

jobs.description:
Develop new features for WOW! for business.
Lead frontend team of 6 developers.

jobs.description:
Develop, design and build all the layers (frontend and backend) in FCNA and SIGI (webapps to be used by NOS co-workers).
Also have been envolved in other projects, to make some more technical decisions and guide the more junior developers.

jobs.description: Migrate an internal management webapp from Adobe Flash into Angular 6 on the frontend and Sprint MVN framework with Java 8 on the backend.
